key_highlights: Gaël KIAMPI (Président) chaired the meeting with 17 present and 7 absent members.
Vladimir SOUA (Rapporteur) finalized the analysis for MAMAYAKO SARL and KENNY'S AND CO SARL, with plans to draft the FAR and schedule a Credit Committee.
Loïc KAMENI is working on the Mil/sorgho study and USSD Sara analysis, awaiting DSI feedback.
Jordan KAMSUKOM is developing a new dashboard for commercial activities and conducting GFA V2 training.
Charlène GHOMSI is managing the MINSUP project and awaiting DRB feedback on the cahier de charge.
Brice DZANGUE is preparing a report on card limits for CPS presentation.
Franklin TANDJA successfully tested COMEX à distance and is developing Agence Mobile V2 criteria.
Boris MAKONG is responsible for sending the weekly activity report under penalty of sanctions.
miscellaneous: The DRI Solidarity account balance was XAF 892,540 as of 23/05/2025.
Members must submit weekly activity reports by Thursday to participate in Friday meetings.
Several resolutions remain ongoing, including the deployment of FirstCopilot and the GFA V2 dashboard.
Sanctions were issued for non-executed resolutions and non-participation, with amounts ranging from 2,500 to 5,000 FCFA.
